fork_info.title: ONT Post-PCR Pooling & Purification for Fungal Barcoding

creator.name: Stephen Douglas Russell
creator.affiliation: Mycota Lab / The Hoosier Mushroom Society

keywords: fungi, PCR, ONT, nanopore, minion, magnetic beads, purification

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"25g5i","text":"Bring magnetic beads to room temp. **Very Important**","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eicm8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c4fj4","text":"Heat a fresh, sterile 1.5uL tube of molecular grade water or Low TE buffer to   in the heat block. 500uL should be sufficient.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cppdv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"121899F0D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"51781","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32e6c","text":"Create a fresh batch of 80% ethanol. You will be using   in this protocol. You will be using more later, so make extra. A 15mL tube is one potential type of vessel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3uhhl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jpqe","text":"  100% ethanol (denatured from IBISCI works fine) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b6eob","text":"  molecular water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"de155","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"F3263260D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"93796","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"F51928C0D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"93797","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"F7564780D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"93798","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m3hk","text":"We will be combining an equal volume of PCR product from each well of each plate into a single pool in a 1.5mL DNA LoBind tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h0s4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27uin","text":"Using a 10uL multichannel pipette with filtered tips, transfer   or    of PCR product from each row of each 96 well plate of PCR amplicons into the corresponding tubes of a new PCR 8 strip.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aqp1h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34tce","text":"The PCR products are already barcoded so you can use a single row of tips for each 96 well plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35k8u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ub4g","text":"Use  from each PCR reaction for a standard run of 5 plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"59k0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"6EEB1C90E61011ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":"93803","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"DF11A9D0D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"93804","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"0D7B0A90E61211ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":"93806","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erdgq","text":"Using a 200uL pipette with filter tips, transfer the PCR pools from each of the eight tubes of the strip into a new 1.5mL DNA Low Bind tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8aib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1eo6q","text":"Optional: You can make pools containing any number of samples or plates and store them separately, although I typically don't do this. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23gno","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i4d1","text":"Final 1.5mL tube volumes (as a reference):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22hr4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eg17k","text":"5 plates - 480 samples -   (3uL per cell) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6d4tq","text":"7 plates - 672 samples -   (2uL per cell) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ebqqn","text":"10 plates - 960 samples -   (1.5uL per cell)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6840l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hidd","text":"Mix the tube gently by pipette mixing or inverting the tube. Don't vortex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dghms","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7c0t","text":"The pool can be stored at  for at least 1 week or at   for much longer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6f45f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"960","error":false,"guid":"DBE0A2C0E61011ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":"93811","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1344","error":false,"guid":"6764E1DAF30B11EC99750A58A9FEAC02","id":"93812","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1440","error":false,"guid":"93F403A0330C11ED8890A5CA018E45E6","id":"93813","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39t3l","text":"Subsample   of the amplicon pool to a new 1.5mL DNA LoBind tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cvk8p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"FB91CE50D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"93814","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dcbb1","text":"Vortex or shake beads thoroughly for   to suspend them in the solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1obm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8uj6a","text":"Add 0.5X ratio of magnetic beads to the 1.5mL tube containing the pooled amplicons. Ex - for 250uL subsampled pool, add   of beads. For 500mL amplicon pool, add   of beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":161,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5fs9q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f62es","text":"Mix thoroughly by pipetting up and down 10 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"54D33B70D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"93816","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"27B47DE0F30C11EC905D1355217190A7","id":"93817","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3p652","text":"Incubate for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5tvld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"4B8D4510D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"83038","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amg40","text":"Spin down tube for  . Place sample tube on the magnetic separator for   or until the solution clears. Beads should now be on the side of the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"g961","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ktmg","text":"Note: if you are using green Taq, then the liquid will not be completely clear at this point. It will still be green, but you should be able to see the beads on the side of the tube. No green should be visible at any step after this wash step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"593rr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5,"guid":"14C307E005EC11ED98CB39296D8DE797","id":"83039","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"41BFCF30D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"83040","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7asol","text":"With the tube still on the magnet, remove the liquid from the tube and discard. Be sure not to disturb the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7ngo","text":"With the tube still on the magnet, add   of 80% ethanol to the tube and let sit for  . Try to minimize disturbance of the beads. Fill gently with liquid stream from the pipette tip on opposite side of the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7jltu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fff0g","text":"I will typically leave the pipette tip on the pipettor until the time is up, and remove the ethanol with the same tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"97q15","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"530B16E0D8A211ECAB17DFA380618E2A","id":"93818","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"3097DF40D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"83041","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c7klf","text":"Remove ethanol by pipetting and discard. I will typically discard the tip with the fluid still in it. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nkna","text":" Repeat the ethanol wash one time.    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5evj1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"00FF8143E4E911EE9B730A58A9FEAC02","step_guid":"A8367363A0F841FDBAB20AB2B435BDD7","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3tfqf","text":"Dry by incubating the tube for 10 minutes at room temperature.  Ensure all of the ethanol has evaporated from the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4csvu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pt25","text":"If there is much visible ethanol in the tube, you can remove from the magnet, spin down for 10 seconds, put the tube back on the magnet, and remove the excess with a pipette tip. If there is visible ethanol, but not enough to suck up in a tip, you can move it around the side of the tube with clean tip. This will help it evaporate faster.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13nur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aai7e","text":"Plan ahead: This is a good time to prepare your Qubit solution and gather supplies for library prep. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an94h","text":"Remove the tube from the magnet and add   of   Low TE buffer or molecular water. Pipette up and down five to ten times to mix until the pellet is fully suspended. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"busf7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btrtg","text":"The DNA will now be released from the beads and suspended in the water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bn5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"45","error":false,"guid":"4348EAC0D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"93819","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"467B17E0D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"51782","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pi31","text":"Incubate for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"c4rb3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"61CF3F80D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"83042","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gcj","text":"Place the tube back on the magnet for  , or until the solution is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ch48v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"7361B110D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":"83043","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
